alert.note: Alert for DeKalb; Gwinnett; North Fulton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 6:51PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central DeKalb, southern Gwinnett and central Fulton Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 651 PM EDT, scattered strong thunderstorms were along a line extending from Bankhead to North Decatur to Lithonia, and moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Atlanta, Decatur, Peachtree Corners, Sandy Springs, Dunwoody, Snellville, Lilburn, Loganville, Chamblee, Norcross, Doraville, Clarkston, Stone Mountain, Avondale Estates, Grayson, Lithonia, Pine Lake, Tucker, North Decatur and North Atlanta. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
